testcase.classname: F01_Register | users could register with new accounts
testcase.name: guest user could register with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user go to register page..............................................passed When user select gender type................................................passed And user enter first name "automation" and last name "tester"...............passed And user enter date of birth "28/9/2009"....................................passed And user enter email "test@example.com" field...............................passed And user fills Password fields "P@ssw0rd" "P@ssw0rd"........................passed And user clicks on register button..........................................passed Then success message is displayed...........................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with "valid" "test@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd"..............passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could not login with invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with "invalid" "wrong@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd"...........passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user could not login to the system.....................................passed

testcase.classname: F03_currencies | users could use change currencies
testcase.name: user could change currencies
testcase.system-out: When user select Euro currency..............................................passed Then Euro Symbol is shown on the four products in the Home page.............passed

testcase.classname: F04_search | users could use search functionality
testcase.name: user could search for product by name
testcase.system-out: When user search by product name "book".....................................passed Then user gets redirected to search page....................................passed And Search page contains relevant results...................................passed

testcase.name: user could search for product by name 2
testcase.system-out: When user search by product name "laptop"...................................passed Then user gets redirected to search page....................................passed And Search page contains relevant results...................................passed

testcase.classname: F05_hoverCategories | users could use Hover categories functionality
testcase.name: user hover on a category and select sub-category
testcase.system-out: Given user hover on categories..............................................passed When user select a random sub-category......................................passed Then sub-category page is opened successfully...............................passed

testcase.name: user click on first slider and gets redirected to its page
testcase.failure:
When user clicks on nokia slider............................................passed Then user is redirected to nokia slider page................................failed
